mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.rate_id AS "rateId", a.bank_no AS "bankNo", a.bank_name AS "bankName", a.bank_card_type AS "bankCardType", a.charge_type AS "chargeType", a.charge_ratio AS "chargeRatio", a.charge_fee AS "chargeFee", a.max_fee AS "maxFee", a.min_fee AS "minFee", a.create_user AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.update_user AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.charge_max AS "chargeMax", a.charge_min AS "chargeMin", a.charge_max2 AS "chargeMax2", a.charge_min2 AS "chargeMin2", a.charge_ratio2 AS "chargeRatio2", a.charge_fee2 AS "chargeFee2", a.charge_max3 AS "chargeMax3", a.charge_min3 AS "chargeMin3", a.charge_ratio3 AS "chargeRatio3", a.charge_fee3 AS "chargeFee3"
mapper.select:
SELECT a.bank_card_type AS "bankCardType" FROM merchant_rate_bank_check a
WHERE a.rate_id = #{rateId} GROUP BY a.bank_card_type
mapper.insert:
insert into merchant_rate_bank_check
id,
rate_id,
bank_no,
bank_name,
bank_card_type,
charge_type,
charge_ratio,
charge_fee,

charge_min,

charge_min2,
charge_ratio2,
charge_fee2,
charge_max3,
charge_min3,
charge_ratio3,
charge_fee3,

update merchant_rate_bank_check
rate_id = #{rateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bank_no = #{bankNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_card_type = #{bankCardType,jdbcType=CHAR},
charge_type = #{chargeType,jdbcType=CHAR},
charge_ratio = #{chargeRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_fee = #{chargeFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, max_fee = #{maxFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, min_fee = #{minFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_max = #{chargeMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_min = #{chargeMin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_max2 = #{chargeMax2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_min2 = #{chargeMin2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_ratio2 = #{chargeRatio2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_fee2 = #{chargeFee2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_max3 = #{chargeMax3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_min3 = #{chargeMin3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_ratio3 = #{chargeRatio3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_fee3 = #{chargeFee3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createBy.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateBy.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update merchant_rate_bank_check
rate_id = #{rateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bank_card_type = #{bankCardType,jdbcType=CHAR},
charge_type = #{chargeType,jdbcType=CHAR},
charge_ratio = #{chargeRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_fee = #{chargeFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, max_fee = #{maxFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, min_fee = #{minFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_max = #{chargeMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_min = #{chargeMin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_max2 = #{chargeMax2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_min2 = #{chargeMin2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_ratio2 = #{chargeRatio2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_fee2 = #{chargeFee2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_max3 = #{chargeMax3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_min3 = #{chargeMin3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_ratio3 = #{chargeRatio3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_fee3 = #{chargeFee3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
update_time = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateBy.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND rate_id = #{rateId}
AND bank_card_type = #{bankCardType}
